For a show called the "Tokaido Road" they sure didn't have much about 
it! The mentioned it all of two or three times! They mentioned the 47 
Ronin, but then said that their mass suicide was the act of revenge! 
I thought their suicide was their punishment for their revenge?! Am I 
wrong?! They also mentioned (just barely) the fall of the Shogunate, 
but not only did they not say anything about the Boshin War, they 
made no reference to Saigo, Okubo, or Katsura! They mentioned 
Takasugi of all people!!! So basically if you missed the program, you 
didn't miss anything the group hasn't already discussed. -sigh- And I 
went and got my hopes up for nothing...

-MissBehavin
